tasks.name: Perfect Olm (Solo)

You also cannot let his claws regenerate or take damage from the same acid pool back to back.

tasks.name: Perfect Nylocas

tasks.name: Back in My Day...

tasks.name: Hard Mode? Completed It

tasks.name: Perfect Zebak
tasks.description: Defeat Zebak without anyone taking any damage from: poison, Zebak's basic attacks off-prayer, blood spawns and waves. You also must not push more than two jugs on the roar attack during the fight (you may destroy stationary ones). You must have all Zebak invocations activated.

tasks.name: Perfect Scabaras
tasks.description: Complete the Scabaras room in less than a minute without anyone taking any damage from puzzles.

tasks.name: Chompington
tasks.description: Defeat Zebak using only melee attacks and without dying yourself.

tasks.name: You are not prepared
tasks.description: Complete a full Tombs of Amascut raid only using supplies given inside the tomb and without anyone dying.

tasks.name: Perfect Wardens
tasks.description: Defeat The Wardens in a group of two or more, without anyone taking avoidable damage from the following: Warden attacks, obelisk attacks, lightning attacks in phase three, skull attack in phase three, Demi god attacks in phase three. You must have all Wardens invocations activated.

tasks.name: Better get movin'
tasks.description: Defeat Elidinis' Warden in phase three of the Wardens fight with 'Aerial Assault', 'Stay vigilant' and 'Insanity' invocations activated and without dying yourself.

tasks.name: Perfect Akkha
tasks.description: Complete Akkha in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: Akkha's attacks off-prayer, Akkha's special attacks (orbs, memory, detonate), exploding shadow timers, orbs in the enrage phase or attacking Akkha with the wrong style. You must have all Akkha invocations activated.

tasks.name: Tombs Speed Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (normal) within 18 mins at any group size.

tasks.name: Perfect Ba-Ba
tasks.description: Defeat Ba-Ba in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: Ba-Ba's Attacks off-prayer, Ba-Ba's slam, rolling boulders, rubble attack or falling rocks. No sarcophagi may be opened. You must have all Ba-Ba invocations activated.

tasks.name: Perfect Kephri
tasks.description: Defeat Kephri in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: egg explosions, Kephri's attacks, Exploding Scarabs, Bodyguards, dung attacks. No eggs may hatch throughout the fight.

tasks.description: Defeat Phosani's Nightmare within 7:30 minutes.

tasks.name: Can't Wake Up
tasks.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare 5 times in a row without leaving Phosani's Dream.

tasks.name: Phosani's Grandmaster
tasks.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare 25 times.

tasks.name: Perfect Phosani's Nightmare
tasks.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare while only taking damage from husks, power blasts and weakened Parasites. Also, without having your attacks slowed by the Nightmare Spores or letting a Sleepwalker reach Phosani's Nightmare.

tasks.name: Nightmare (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Defeat the Nightmare (5-scale) in less than 3:30 minutes.

tasks.name: Terrible Parent
tasks.description: Kill the Nightmare solo without the Parasites healing the boss for more than 100 health.

tasks.name: Nightmare (Solo) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Defeat the Nightmare (Solo) in less than 16 minutes.

tasks.name: A Long Trip
tasks.description: Kill the Nightmare without any player losing any prayer points.

tasks.name: Theatre (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (5-scale) in less than 14 minutes and 15 seconds.

tasks.name: Morytania Only
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood without any member of the team equipping a non-barrows weapon (except Dawnbringer).

tasks.name: Perfect Theatre
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood without anyone dying through any means and whilst everyone in the team completes the following Combat Achievement tasks in a single run: "Perfect Maiden", "Perfect Bloat", "Perfect Nylocas", "Perfect Sotetseg", "Perfect Xarpus" and "Perfect Verzik".

tasks.name: Theatre (4-Scale) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (4-scale) in less than 15 minutes.

tasks.name: Theatre (Duo) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (Duo) in less than 26 minutes.

tasks.name: Theatre (Trio) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (Trio) in less than 17 minutes and 30 seconds.

tasks.name: Theatre of Blood Grandmaster
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood 150 times.

tasks.name: Harder Mode I
tasks.description: Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone sharing the ball with anyone, without anyone dying, and without anyone taking damage from any of its other attacks or stepping on the wrong tile in the maze.

tasks.name: Pack Like a Yak
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode within the challenge time, with no deaths and without anyone buying anything from a supply chest.

tasks.name: Harder Mode II
tasks.description: Defeat Xarpus in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode after letting the exhumeds heal him to full health and without anyone in the team taking any damage.

tasks.name: Personal Space
tasks.description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode with a least 3 people in the room, without anyone in your team standing on top of each other.

tasks.name: Team Work Makes the Dream Work
tasks.description: When Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode uses her yellow power blast attack while the tornadoes are active, have everyone get through the attack without taking damage. This cannot be completed with one player alive

tasks.name: Theatre: HM (4-Scale) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (4-scale) with an overall time of less than 21 minutes.

tasks.name: Harder Mode III
tasks.description: Defeat Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone attacking her with a melee weapon during her third phase.

tasks.name: Royal Affairs
tasks.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode, complete the Nylocas room without ever letting the Nylocas Prinkipas change styles.

tasks.name: Theatre of Blood: HM Grandmaster
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode 50 times.

tasks.name: Stop Right There!
tasks.description: Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without letting blood spawns create more than 15 blood trails.

tasks.name: Nylo Sniper
tasks.description: Defeat Verzik Vitur's in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone in your team causing a Nylocas to explode by getting too close.

tasks.name: Theatre: HM (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (5-scale) with an overall time of less than 19 minutes.

tasks.name: Theatre: HM (Trio) Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (Trio) with an overall time of less than 23 minutes.

tasks.name: Perfection of Apmeken
tasks.description: Complete 'Perfect Apmeken' and 'Perfect Ba-Ba' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

tasks.name: Maybe I'm the boss.
tasks.description: Complete a Tombs of Amascut raid with every single boss invocation activated and without anyone dying.

tasks.name: All Praise Zebak
tasks.description: Defeat Zebak without losing a single prayer point. You must also meet the conditions of the 'Rockin' Around The Croc' achievement.

tasks.name: Tombs Speed Runner II
tasks.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (expert) within 20 mins at any group size.

tasks.name: Perfection of Crondis
tasks.description: Complete 'Perfect Crondis' and 'Perfect Zebak' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

tasks.name: Amascut's Remnant
tasks.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut at raid level 500 or above without anyone dying.

tasks.name: Tombs Speed Runner III
tasks.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (expert) within 18 mins in a group of 8.

tasks.name: Expert Tomb Raider
tasks.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) 50 times.

tasks.name: Perfection of Het
tasks.description: Complete 'Perfect Het' and 'Perfect Akkha' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

tasks.name: Perfection of Scabaras
tasks.description: Complete 'Perfect Scabaras' and 'Perfect Kephri' in a single run of Tombs of Amascut.

tasks.name: Akkhan't Do it
tasks.description: Defeat Akkha with all Akkha invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

tasks.name: Insanity
tasks.description: Complete 'Perfect Wardens' at expert or above.

tasks.name: It Wasn't a Fluke
tasks.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth and sixth challenges back to back without failing.

tasks.name: TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth challenge in less than 5 minutes.

tasks.name: The VI Jad Challenge
tasks.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's sixth challenge.

tasks.name: Jad? What Are You Doing Here?
tasks.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without killing the JalTok-Jad which spawns during wave 69.

tasks.name: Nibbler Chaser
tasks.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without using any magic spells during any wave in the Inferno.

tasks.name: Facing Jad Head-on II
tasks.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping any range or mage weapons before wave 69.

tasks.name: The Floor Is Lava
tasks.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting Jal-ImKot dig during any wave in the Inferno.

tasks.name: Inferno Grandmaster
tasks.description: Complete the Inferno 5 times.

tasks.name: Inferno Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Inferno in less than 65 minutes.

tasks.name: No Luck Required
tasks.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without being attacked by TzKal-Zuk and without taking damage from a JalTok-Jad.

tasks.name: Budget Setup
tasks.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping a Twisted Bow within the Inferno.

tasks.name: Playing with Jads
tasks.description: Complete wave 68 of the Inferno within 30 seconds of the first JalTok-Jad dying.

tasks.name: Wasn't Even Close
tasks.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting your hitpoints fall below 50 during any wave in the Inferno.

tasks.name: No Time for a Drink
tasks.description: Complete the Fight Caves without losing any prayer points.

tasks.name: Denying the Healers II
tasks.description: Complete the Fight Caves without TzTok-Jad being healed by a Yt-HurKot.

tasks.name: Fight Caves Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Complete the Fight Caves in less than 26 minutes and 30 seconds.

tasks.name: Axe Enthusiast
tasks.description: Kill Vardorvis after surviving for 3 minutes of Vardorvis' max speed, and never leaving the centre 25 tiles.

tasks.name: Vardorvis Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Kill Vardorvis in less than 0:55 without a slayer task.

tasks.name: Vardorvis Sleeper
tasks.description: Kill Awakened Vardorvis.

tasks.name: Faithless Encounter
tasks.description: Kill Vorkath without losing any prayer points.

tasks.name: The Fremennik Way
tasks.description: Kill Vorkath with only your fists.

tasks.name: Vorkath Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Kill Vorkath in less than 54 seconds.

tasks.name: Whisperer Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 2:05 without a slayer task.

tasks.name: Dark Memories
tasks.description: Kill the Whisperer whilst spending less than 6 seconds in the pre-enrage shadow realm.

tasks.name: Whispered
tasks.description: Kill the Awakened Whisperer.

tasks.name: Zulrah Speed-Runner
tasks.description: Kill Zulrah in less than 54 seconds, without a slayer task.
